Here’s a concise directory of antique appraisal services and professionals operating in **Kingston**, Ontario:

---

### **Overview**  
Kingston offers specialized antique appraisal services covering collector vehicles (**classic cars**), fine jewelry/artwork (**gemstones**, silverware), household estates (**furniture**, collectibles), and general probate valuations through local experts or regional providers serving Eastern Ontario.

---

### **Antique/Car/Valuation Professionals**

#### **Pristine Appraisal Co.**  
*Specializes:* Collector/classic automobiles  
*Details:*  
- Operated by Marc Racine  
- Contact: 613‑361‑9906 | carappraisal@hotmail.com  
*Notes:* No explicit certifications listed  

#### **Paul Prince – Collector Vehicle Appraiser**  
*Specializes:* Vintage cars/motorcycles (*London-based but serves Eastern ON*)   
+ Contact: paul@prince-cva.ca | www.prince-cva.ca | 519‑666‑1114  

#### **Kingston Fine Jewelry Ltd.**  
*Specializes:* Antique/pre-owned jewelry authentication/appraisal (*since 1987*)    
+ Certified gemologists/GIA-trained staff    
+ Address: Downtown Kingston | Hours: Mon–Sat (~10 AM–5 PM)   
+ Contact: Brandy Pavlich | www.kfljewellery.com | +1‑800‑567‑6464  

---

### Regional Providers Serving Eastern ON  

#### Gordon’s Downsizing & Estate Services (*Ontario-wide*)   
*Services:* Probate valuations for estates (**antique furniture**, art collections). Offers virtual walkthroughs ($499+) or full-household reports ($799+). Specialists coordinate certified gemologists/jewelers when needed ([Source](https://www.gogordons.com/contents-appraisal)).  

#### Caesar’s Auto/Harrison House Valuations (*Harrison/Hamilton area*)    
*Services:* Classic cars/general household items via John Caesar (+1 519 323 7014).   

---

### Pricing Trends 
Typical fees range widely depending on specialty:
The average cost starts around $150/hour for basic item assessments (e.g., single artwork/jewel piece) up to $500+/report for comprehensive auto/household inventories requiring USPAP compliance ([Sources](https://totalestatesolutions.com/appraisal-practice/)).

--- 

For broader coverage beyond automotive/jewelry niches (*e.g.* rare books/textiles), clients often engage Toronto-area firms like EmpireAppraiser (+6472622001) who travel regionally upon request[^6].
